svcproc.title: Air Flow and Emission Control
svcproc.para: Fresh filtered air is inducted through the intake system into the combustion chamber where it is compressed. When the air in the combustion chamber reaches the proper temperature and pressure, a metered amount of fuel is sprayed into the chamber where it burns producing power and exhaust gases. The resulting exhaust gases leave the cylinders through exhaust ports and exhaust manifolds to the mufflers and exhaust piping.
